Package com.logicea.cardsapp.service.cards

Class CardService

java.lang.Object
com.logicea.cardsapp.service.cards.CardService
@Service public class CardService extends Object
A service that provides the core of the API functionality. Calls methods of CardRepository to persist CardEntity instances. Returns CardDto instances to CardController so that the user can receive appropriate payloads. Uses AccessCheckService and PatchMapper for internal work.
See Also:

  • CardRepository

  • Constructor Details

      public CardService()

  • Method Details

    • getCard

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public CardDto getCard(Long id) throws CardNotFoundException, InsufficientPrivilegesException
      Retrieve the card uniquely identified by the provided id.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the card to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A CardDto describing the unique card to return.
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - If the card cannot be found in the repository.
      InsufficientPrivilegesException - If the logged-in user does not have sufficient privileges for viewing the card.

    • replaceCard

      @Transactional public CardDto replaceCard(Long id, CardDto cardDto) throws CardNotFoundException, InsufficientPrivilegesException
      Fully replace the card uniquely identified by the provided id with the information of the provided CardDto.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the card to replace.
      cardDto - The new card to replace the old card with.
      Returns:
      The now replaced card.
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - If the card to replace cannot be found in the repository.
      InsufficientPrivilegesException - If the logged-in user does not have sufficient privileges for replacing the card.

    • updateCard

      @Transactional public CardDto updateCard(Long id, CardDto cardDto)
      Partially or fully update the card uniquely identified by the provided id with the information of the provided CardDto.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the card to update.
      cardDto - The new card information to update the old card with.
      Returns:
      The now partially or fully updated card.
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - If the card to update cannot be found in the repository.
      InsufficientPrivilegesException - If the logged-in user does not have sufficient privileges for updating the card.

    • storeCard

      @Transactional public CardDto storeCard(CardDto cardDto)
      Store the provided card in our repository
      Parameters:
      cardDto - The card to store in our repository.
      Returns:
      The card that was just stored in the repository.

    • getAllCardsByFilter

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<CardDto> getAllCardsByFilter(AggregateGetQueryParams params) throws InsufficientPrivilegesException
      Get all cards that satisfy the criteria provided.
      Parameters:
      params - An instance of AggregateGetQueryParams that specifies pagination, sorting and filtering criteria to apply to the cards that will be returned by the repository.
      Returns:
      A List of cards that satisfy the provided criteria.
      Throws:
      InsufficientPrivilegesException - If a member user attempts to filter the cards by the username of a different member user or an admin.

    • deleteCard

      @Transactional public void deleteCard(Long id) throws CardNotFoundException, InsufficientPrivilegesException
      Hard-delete the provided card from the repository.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the card to delete.
      Throws:
      CardNotFoundException - if we cannot find the card in the repository to delete (design choice).
      InsufficientPrivilegesException - if a member user attempts to delete a card created by either a different member user or an admin.
